channel.title: When I'm in Datmaker what do I put as the animation for legs and bodies?
channel.description:
Okay the choices are... No Animation Inject Blanks Head Object Amulet Left Hand Right Hand Gloves Shoes
Which one do I use?

item.title: When I'm in Datmaker what do I put as the animation for legs and bodies?
item.dc:creator: @dragmagic dragmagic
item.description:
@dragmagic wrote:

[quote=“MrPotatoHead, post:14, topic:258086”]Datmaker can’t do complex things like legs and bodies automatically, go look at all the possible variations for legs and bodies and you’ll see why.

You have to make a special MQO file with all the data ready for datmaker to use. This is what they call doing it manually. And it isn’t that difficult.

Dragmagic put the tutorial on how to do it on his site, see his sig.[/quote]

imthinking of changing the layout unless u want me to leave it?

Read full topic
item.source: When I'm in Datmaker what do I put as the animation for legs and bodies?

item.title: When I'm in Datmaker what do I put as the animation for legs and bodies?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Datmaker can’t do complex things like legs and bodies automatically, go look at all the possible variations for legs and bodies and you’ll see why.

You have to make a special MQO file with all the data ready for datmaker to use. This is what they call doing it manually. And it isn’t that difficult.

Dragmagic put the tutorial on how to do it on his site, see his sig.

Read full topic

[/quote]thats called: stfu it helps ppl

u dont need to say stfu when somone is saying something right … the rules are there for a reason[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 25, 2009, 11:42:44 am[/size][hr][quote=“senne teddy, post:11, topic:258086”]its against rules… sometimes u have to break rules when u can help ppl

but i have one question, how do u know what the vskin, tskin and priorities are?[/quote]
